Header.title: EGLISE DE DIEU DE LA PENETECOTE LIBRE
Header.paragraph: Impacting Families, Church & Communities with the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

About.paragraph: Eglise De Dieu De La Pentecote Libre (Free Pentecostal Church of God), located at 249 Harvard Street in Dorchester Masachusetts was founded in 1991. We are a recognized non-profit organization in the state of Massachusetts. We are called to proclaim the Gospel of Christ and proclaiming the beliefs of the evangelical Christian faith; Maintain the worship of God, Inspire in all persons a love for Christ, and a consciousness of their duties to God and their fellow human beings. We commit our lives to Christ and covenant with each other to demonstrate His Spirit through worship, witnessing, and ministry to the needs of the people of this church and the community.

Services.name: Sunday-Culte
Services.text: First Service starts at 8AM to 10AM. Sunday School starts 10:00AM to 11:15AM. Second Service starts at 11:30AM to 1:00PM.

Services.name: Monday-Devotion
Services.text: Morning devotion starts at 06:00AM. Moring Corporate& Community Prayer starts at 09:00AM.

Services.name: Wednesday-Bible Study
Services.text: Morning Corporate & Community Prayer starts at 09:00AM. Night Service or Corporate Bible Study (every other) starts at 07:00PM.

Features.title: 40 Day Prayer
Features.text: La prière en groupe est une partie importante de la vie de l’Eglise, au même titre que l’adoration..

Features.title: Church Anniversary
Features.text: Traditionnellement, le mois de Juillet, consacré mois de la celebration de l’Église de Dieu de la Pentecote Libre.

Features.title: Action de Grace
Features.text: Dans le but de chercher la face de Dieu et de continuer à soutenir les guerres de l’Eternel.
